text: Avarkal (unkalutan porukku) purappata (unmaiyakave) enniyiruntal atarku ventiya tayarippukalai (munnatakave) avarkal ceytirupparkal. Eninum (unkalutan) avarkal purappatuvatai allah veruttu avarkal purappatatu tatai ceytu vittan. Akave, (mutiyor ciriyor penkal ponra, porukku varamutiyatu vittil) tankupavarkalutan ninkalum tanki vitunkal enru (avarkalukkuk) kurappattu vittatu
